      public Card cardPlayed​(int playerIndex, Card played, int targetIndex)
      Description copied from class: Bot
      Method called when another player plays a card.
      Specified by:
      cardPlayed in class Bot
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - the index of the player
      played - the card they have played
      targetIndex - the target of the card if the card targets someone, else -1
      Returns:
      a reaction card if you want to play one (i.e. nope card), otherwise null

    • selfExplodingKittenDrawn

      public int selfExplodingKittenDrawn()
      Description copied from class: Bot
      Method called when you draw an exploding kitten. If you have one, a defuse card is automatically removed from your hand.
      Specified by:
      selfExplodingKittenDrawn in class Bot
      Returns:
      an index where you wish to replace the kitten in the deck. If you do not have a defuse card, you are out of the game, and you may return anything. It will be ignored.

    • takeTurn

      public Action takeTurn()
      Description copied from class: Bot
      Method called when it is your turn. This method will repeatedly be called until you draw a card (2 if you have been attacked) or if you end your turn in other ways (ex. skip, attack, dead to exploding kitten)
      Specified by:
      takeTurn in class Bot
      Returns:
      the action you will take.
      See Also:
      Action
